title.rendered: The Leader Who Had No Title (Odia)

content.rendered:
For more than twenty years, legendary leadership Guru Robin Sharma has helped fortune 500 companies, billionaires, celebrated entrepreneurs and iconic athletes achieve domain dominance. Now, in this life-changing book, he shares the step-by-step method that his clients have used to make their fortunes while positively impacting the world.

As you read this book—carefully crafted as an unforgettable story—you will discover:

  • How the great masters think, lead and live
  • An unusual strategy the pros use to produce genius-grade work
  • Proven daily tactics to multiply your productivity so you own your field
  • A transformational blueprint for building an amazing company
  • “Insider-only” routines to bulletproof your mindset, develop undefeatable inner strength and know true happiness
